author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Erwan de FERRIERES "time-dropdown should start at 0 and not 1" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2950) - OFBIZ-2950
When using a time-dropdown, drop-downs are starting at 1 and not 0. So we can't select times between 00:00 and 1:00. Timers start at 01:01.

author: fhanik
msg: Enable the ability to disable the buffered writer. This does bunch of copying when writing using an async thread there is no need for such a thing

author: jukka
msg: Make the jcr-tests POM work as a standalone component.
